Name: FarmPlot
Description: A structure where a plant can be grown and tended to by a farmer.

Options.Name: Berries
Options.Description: Berry bushes grow quickly but do not handle bad weather well.

Options.Name: Corn
Options.Description: Corn is a hardy plant but yields less than wheat.

Options.Name: Wheat
Options.Description: Wheat has a higher yield than corn but is more prone to disease.
